name: Heat it Up
description:
Heat it Up

Made for the VimJam 3

Focus: Multi-Use
Theme: Turn up the Heat

Made in 2 days after not really making progress on and then scrapping my first idea.

You control the little flame, who has to collect firewood to heat up.
The Focus Multi-Use is implemented in the Controls. You use one button for multiple actions/movements.

Controls:
A or Left arrow - Move left AND down
D or Right arrow - Move right AND up
Spacebar - Change between Left-Right-Mode and Up-Down-Mode

Credit:
The Art for the flame and the firewood is made by the AI program DALL-E 2: https://openai.com/dall-e-2/

Note: Please play in Fullscreen
